extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the vulnerability by retrieving the installed firmware or software version.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?
Is disabling the network server function in CodeMeter possible?

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Network Server Function in CodeMeter
extracted_playbook.description: Disable the network server function within CodeMeter to mitigate the vulnerability.
commands: Navigate to the CodeMeter WebAdmin Website
Select option Settings > Server > Server access
Click 'Apply' button on the bottom of the website

extracted_playbook.title: Update CodeMeter Control Center Software
extracted_playbook.description: Update the CodeMeter control center software to at least version 7.60c to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Firmware for u-control web Controllers and IoT-Gateways
extracted_playbook.description: Update the firmware to at least version 2.0.2 for affected u-control web Controllers and IoT-Gateways.
